PLAINS.description: A rich, green plain. Easy to traverse, but offers little defensive cover.

SEA.description: A body of water. Only naval and air units can traverse seas.

ROAD.description: A paved road. Easy to traverse, but offers little protection.

BRIDGE.description: A paved road. Easy to traverse, but offers little protection.

MOUNTAIN.description: A steep mountain. Infantry units add 3 to their vision range from here.

WOODS.description: In Fog of War, units hidden here can only be seen by adjacent units and air units.

RIVER.description: A gentle flowing river. Only infantry units can ford rivers.

REEF.description: In Fog of War, units hidden here can only be seen by adjacent units and air units.

SHOAL.description: A sandy shoal. Lander units load and unload units here.

PIPE.description: A Black Hole pipeline. Thick armour renders it indestructible. No units can pass it.

PIPESEAM.description: A Black Hole pipeline. The armor is weaker here than on other sections of the pipe.

MISSILESILO.description: A missile silo. Has a huge blast radius & unlimited range, but it can only fire once.

CITY.description: A normal city. Ground units gain supplies and HP in allied cities.

BASE.description: A base. Allied bases deploy, supply, and restore HP to ground units.

AIRPORT.description: An air base. Allied bases deploy, supply, and restore HP to air units.

PORT.description: A naval base. Allied bases deploy, supply and restore HP to naval units.

COMTOWER.description: Controlling a tower will grant all units you control +10% attack.

LAB.description: Similar to an HQ. A place where units are designed and developed.

VOLCANO.description: A dangerous volcano that spews out molten magma on a daily basis.

HQ.description: Ground units can be supplied and replenished here. If an army's HQ is captured, they have lost the battle!
